en-US.summary: Test your ability to spot literal fake news.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open Onion Not The Onion
Alexa, play Onion Not The Onion
en-US.name: onion-not-the-onion
en-US.description:
Test your ability to spot fake news amongst headlines that sound like they really should be fake, but arent.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Onion Not The Onion" or "Alexa, open Onion Not The Onion" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
